title: Mariupol's defenders dig in for last stand as Russia threatens to 'filter' out men - CNN
content:
1. Mariupol's defenders dig in for last stand as Russia threatens to 'filter' out men  CNN
  2. Russians Are Rounding Up Thousands of Ukrainians in 'Filtration Camps,' Mariupol Authorities Warn  The Daily Beast
  3. Mariupol on the brink of falling as Ukrainian fighters defy Russian surrender demands  Los Angeles Times
  4. War in Ukraine live updates: Russia batters eastern Ukraine, but forces in Mariupol refuse to surrender  NPR
  5. How a Mariupol steel plant became a holdout for the city's resistance  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The fate of the Ukrainian city of Mariupol is hanging on an unknown number of defenders making their last stand at an iron and steel plant.
